facts.text: I look like a little ball of fire! My bright red and orange colors make me one of the prettiest fish.
I'm a dwarf angelfish! I stay small and cute my whole life.
I love to hide in coral and rocks! You might see me peeking out from my favorite spot.
I eat algae and tiny animals called tunicates. I'm always nibbling on something!
I'm shy at first, but once I feel safe, I'll swim around exploring everywhere!

profile.habitat: Coral reefs in the Pacific Ocean
